page.title: 05Education in Nailsea
page.content:
Nailsea has 9 schools. They are;- {Nailsea Comprehensive} School(11-18yrs)* {Nailsea Church of England}Voluntary Controlled Junior School(7-11yrs) {Grove}County Junior School(7-11yrs)* {Golden Valley}County Primary School (5-11yrs)* {St. Francis}Roman Catholic Primary School(5-11yrs)* {Greenslade}County Infants School (5-7yrs) {Four Oaks}County Infants School (5-7yrs)* {Hannah More}County Infants School (5-7yrs)* {Ravenswood}County Special School (for handicapped & E.S.N. 5-18yrs)
(Of these 9 Schools, 6 are in our survey area; those marked with *)
